text: Blurred Lines is the sixth studio album by American recording artist Robin Thicke. It was released on July 12, 2013. It features the hit single, "Blurred Lines", the album's title track. == Track listing == ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== Chart (2013) Peak position Canadian Albums Chart 1 Chinese Albums (Sino Chart) 30 Italian Albums (FIMI) 34 Official Charts. UK Albums Chart. The Official Charts Company. 1 US Billboard 200 1 ===Year-end charts=== Chart (2013) Position Australian Urban Albums Charts 16 Belgian Albums Chart (Wallonia) 148 Swiss Albums Chart 97 US Billboard 200 36 US Top R&B;/Hip-Hop Albums 11 US Top R&B; AlbumsR&B; Albums : Dec 27, 2013 | Billboard Chart Archive 2 == Certifications == ==Release history== Region Date Label Germany July 12, 2013 Interscope (Universal) France July 15, 2013 Polydor United Kingdom United States July 30, 2013 Interscope Canada Japan August 7, 2013 Universal International China October 27, 2013 STARSING CULTURE ==Notes== # Gaye was not credited as a songwriter, but a court later ruled that the song plagiarized Gaye's song "Got to Give It Up". ==References== Category:2013 albums Category:Pop albums Category:Funk albums Category:Neo soul albums Category:Blue-eyed soul albums Category:R&B; albums
title: Blurred Lines
